consolidationOptions.name: CJS imports ESM (requireESM pattern)
consolidationOptions.description: index.cjs uses createRequire or dynamic import to load index.mjs
benefits: Single source of truth in index.mjs
drawbacks: Slightly more complex CJS entry point
consolidationOptions.implementation: Use createRequire() or dynamic import() in index.cjs to load index.mjs

consolidationOptions.name: Shared core module
consolidationOptions.description: Both index.mjs and index.cjs import from a shared core implementation
benefits: Explicit separation of entry logic and core logic
Native module system usage for each entry point

consolidationOptions.name: Keep separate but synchronized
consolidationOptions.description: Maintain both files but ensure they're functionally identical
consolidationOptions.implementation: Add tooling to verify both entry points produce identical results

recommendations.title: Remove orphaned functions
recommendations.description: Found 17 functions that are defined but never called or exported
recommendations.impact: Reduces bundle size and improves maintainability
recommendations.action: Review and remove unused function definitions

recommendations.title: Review auto-wrap helper redundancy
recommendations.description: auto-wrap.mjs helper may be redundant with built-in EventEmitter patching
recommendations.action: Analyze if auto-wrap functionality is already covered by als-eventemitter.mjs
